#summary Solutions to exercises in Physical Modeling in MATLAB.

= How to use this repository =

To view solutions, click on the Source tab and then the Browse tab.

To contribute solutions, follow these steps:

  # Read about HowToUseSubversion.
  # Check out this repository following the instructions under the Source tab.
  # Add your solution.
  # Check in the change (you might have to get permission from Allen).
  # Alert Allen to do a code review.
  # Make requested changes, or review other people's changes.
  # Enjoy the satisfaction of a job well done!
